## Clustering

### Hierarchical clustering



```{r cars}
load('tissuesGeneExpression.rda')
d <- dist(t(e))
hclust_avg <- hclust(d, method = 'average')
```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(hclust_avg, labels = tab$Tissue)
```

## K-means
```{r}
set.seed(1)
km <- kmeans(t(e[1:2, ]), centers = 7)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.width=3}

plot(e[1, ], e[2, ], col = as.numeric(as.factor(tab$Tissue)), pch = 16)
plot(e[1, ], e[2, ], col = km$cluster, pch = 16)

```
